articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: PSG - Le maillot fourth dévoilé - Goal.com
articles.description: Barcelona should have used Real Madrid’s sale of Cristiano Ronaldo as inspiration and offloaded Lionel Messi during the summer of 2020, says Rivaldo, with the Liga giants now expected to seek out a buyer for Philippe Coutinho as they endeavour to raise funds.
